mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(product_type, product_name, price, sales_price, price_unit) VALUES (#{productType},#{productName},#{price},#{salesPrice},#{priceUnit});
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET product_type=#{productType}, product_name=#{productName}, price=#{price}, sales_price=#{salesPrice}, price_unit=#{priceUnit} WHERE product_id=#{productMstId}
mapper.sql: SELECT product_id as productMstId, product_type as productType, product_name as productName, price, sales_price as salesPrice from product
